name: @tertium/vscode-js-shared-configs
description: Visual Studio Code JS shared configs.

scripts.release:patch: git checkout main && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public && git checkout develop && git rebase main && git push
scripts.release:minor: git checkout develop && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: git checkout develop && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push && npm publish --access public

author: Vitalii Balabanov
